Package cycling

Class Races

java.lang.Object
cycling.Races
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Races extends Object implements Serializable
Races stores the information relevent to a given race

    • removeStage

      public void removeStage​(int stageId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Removes a stage from the race
      Parameters:
      stageId - ID of the stage to be removed
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If there is no stage matching that ID in the race

      Parameters:
